primary.title: ‘I just want my husband’s remains to be returned to us’
primary.description: COVID-19 has made it more difficult for seafarers on international fishing vessels to get medical help. The death of Stanley Jungco shows the hardships fishermen go through to provide for their families.

secondary.title: Unemployed overseas workers prefer to stay abroad than go home
Retraining nearly 300,000 jobless Filipinos returning from abroad
Bodies of 30 OFW's who died from COVID-19 in Saudi Arabia are flown back

carousel.title: Meet the Philippine woman protecting a marine sanctuary in Siquijor from illegal fisherman
carousel.description: Evelyn Malicay and volunteers patrol the protected waters of Siquijor from commercial vessels illegally fishing in the area.

carousel.title: The Dirty Secret Behind The West's Coconut Fad
carousel.description: Farmers receive pennies on the dollar from the palm oil industry as demands for coconut products boom in the west

carousel.title: The 20-Year Hunt for the Man Behind the Love Bug Virus
carousel.description: 43 year-old Onel de Guzman, answers what made him write the virus in his college years that infected millions of Windows computers.
